title: Treasure Hunt
description: There is a coin hidden on campus. Find it! (You are allowed to compete in teams of any size but a majority of members must be CMI affiliated)

title: Scavenger Hunt
description:
This is not your elementary school's scavenger hunt. The list contains items that must be found in the style of a traditional scavenger hunt, but there are many other items that must be built, performed, written, programmed, drawn, eaten, designed, painted, solved, won, and (maybe) endured.
 Teams of 4 are allowed of which 3 have to be CMI affliated.
 Based on UChicago's Scav

title: King of Memes
description: You think you are funny? Well prove it! Make memes on the events of Tessellate or using Tessellate pics as meme templates. Prizes for most memes made and best meme
